Games of 2017

Welcome to my journal of the best games I have played in 2017. They may not have all been released in 2017 but if I played it and liked it, it goes on the list.

Dec 19, 2017

Wolfenstein II The New Colossus

  • The story is batshit crazy, in the best possible way.
  • I won’t spoil it but my god, Machine Games goes to some crazy places that you never will see coming.
  • Yet every character is superbly written and well rounded.
  • The human drama element, is better than most of games....

    Read More

Nov 7, 2017

Super Mario Odyssey

Man, Nintendo is on a roll, a serious roll. Zelda, Mario Kart, Splatoon and now this, the best Mario game in years. 2017 is the year of Nintendo. And Super Mario Odyssey is the photo finish to prove it.

Read More

Oct 16, 2017

Destiny 2

Every time I play Destiny 2, I am constantly thinking: Is Destiny finally what I wanted it to be? Which seems like an odd thing to be thinking about when playing a game. But for some reason, there is something about Destiny that makes me feel that it should be...

Oct 8, 2017

Dishonored Death of the Outsider

Dishonored: Death of the Outsider is not simply more content for Dishonored 2. But an old-school expansion with more stuff in it that other full priced games. Death of the Outsider takes everything that was great about Dishonored 2, adds some new and refreshing twists and makes the return to...

Read More

Sep 5, 2017

Splatoon 2

Looking back, the idea that Nintendo couldn’t make an amazing shooter seems absurd. They’ve managed to conquer every other genre, so why would a competitive shooter be the one Nintendo would disappoint on.

Read More

Aug 8, 2017

Rise of the Tomb Raider

Rise of the Tomb Raider is a good game, definitely. But I can’t help feeling that if I’d played it on its original release in 2015, that I would have been blown away. It’s a testament to how many great games have come out in 2017 so far, that Tomb...

Read More

Jul 14, 2017

The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild

Full disclosure – I have not yet finished this. but with nearly 50 hours of my life spent in this game. I have full confidence in saying this is not just one of the best games I have played this year but that I have played ever.

Read More

Jun 21, 2017

Mario Kart 8 Deluxe

Mario Kart is pure joy, like the essence of a Saturday morning cartoon. It has always felt this way for me and Mario Kart 8: Deluxe is thankfully no exception.

Read More

Jun 8, 2017

Mass Effect Andromeda

I hate to write this, but Mass Effect Andromeda is a bad game. But what’s maybe worse to me personally, it’s a bad Bioware game. It feels like a game made in the style of Bioware, not by Bioware.

Read More

Apr 21, 2017

Horizon Zero Dawn

It’s rare for a video game to tell an interesting story, it’s even rarer for that to be an interesting sci-fi story. But yet, that’s the part of Horizon that really hit me.

Read More

Jan 27, 2017

Doom

Games should be fun, first and foremost. Yes, they can be and are art. But sometimes you just want to lose yourself in exactly what video games are, games. This is what Doom sets out to do and thankfully, achieves.

Read More

Dishonored 2

Writing about Dishonoured 2 is sad. Not sad because of the game itself, in fact, the opposite is true. But sad because more people didn’t play this game, that more people didn’t get to support a team of people who have picked up the choose-your-own stealth genre and did it...
